sense.def: Pathological Condition Combined Designation of pian tou feng 偏頭風 , hemilateral head wind, and zheng tou feng 正頭風 , ordinary head wind [affecting the entire head], i.e. variants of tou feng 頭風 , head wind, characterized by headache. Tai ping hui min he ji Recipe book. Northern Song, ju fang 1107~1110. 太平惠民和劑局方 1 Recipe Entry bai long wan 白龍 丸 , white dragon pills, cure 偏正頭風 , “ hemilateral and ordinary head wind ”.
